about_the_game:
A creepy and dangerous world, no matter where your feet lead you, only fog awaits ahead, which seemingly mercilessly mocks the troubles of the still living and already dead creatures of this world, among which man is far from being at the top of the food chain. Can you adapt to the rules of this world and survive? And if you can - can you continue to call yourself a man or will you turn into a kind of hordes of monsters aimlessly loitering around?

Features:
- The battle is divided into phases instead of the classic format when the player and the enemy act in strict order, at the beginning you lay out the cards on the table, then you play the action cards and then the creature cards you put up act, your cards and enemy cards act one after the other depending on the speed
- Wide choice of classes and cards to build your deck
- Perhaps the developer will not starve to death if you buy the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 580
  • Additional Notes: It will most likely work fine on weaker systems as well, but this has not been tested.
